initializer.description: determines how the feature variables are initialized during initialization of an eTaSL execution

sample_time.description: At each sample_time, eTaSL computes new robot joint velocities

reporting_interval.description: Interval in seconds to report the timing statistics to the console

outputhandlers.title: Outputhandlers
outputhandlers.description: Outputhandlers extract data from eTaSL and communicate it in some way to the outside world, such as writing to a file or using a ROS Topic

inputhandlers.title: Inputhandlers
inputhandlers.description: Inputhandlers get information from the outside world and puts it into eTaSL

robotdriver.title: Robotdriver
robotdriver.description: Robotdriver interfaces robot hardware with eTaSL and runs in a separate thread, communicating with shared memory for reduced latency
